entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RootComponentTypeCache Prevents Dynamic Component Regeneration in Interactive Server Mode #60573
  • Perf regression: json, json #60568
  • Perf improvement: https, multiple_queries #60567
  • Published size regression: basicminimalapipublishaot #60563
  • Perf regression: updates #60562
  • Double-compression when trying to host pre-compressed (`.gz`, `.br`) files via MapStaticAssets #60558
  • Blazor WASM PWA #60557
    Backlog
  • In Minimal API, there are binding issues when using `FromForm`. #60556

Closed

  • Perf regression: mTls-handshakes-httpsys #60554
  • C̳o̳m̳o̳ ̳H̳a̳c̳k̳e̳a̳r̳ ̳I̳n̳s̳t̳a̳g̳r̳a̳m̳ ̳E̳s̳p̳e̳c̳i̳a̳l̳i̳s̳t̳a̳ ̳C̳i̳b̳e̳r̳n̳e̳t̳i̳c̳o̳ #60561

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for AddOpenApiOperationTransformer API #60566
    feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Enable arm64 DEBs #60565
    area-infrastructure
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-preview.3.25122.1 #60564
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Add module initializer for Verify.SourceGenerators #60547
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Enhancement] HybridWebView.SetInvokeJavaScriptTarget() Multi-target support OR Generator to produce target #27990

Closed

PullRequests

Created

    community ✨
  • [iOS] Empty View Overlapping Header in CollectionView with CollectionViewHandler2 #27988
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2

    platform/macOS 🍏, area-navigation, area-core-lifecycle, platform/iOS 🍎, area-testing, community ✨

    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Make ShadowTypeConverter public for .NET 10 #27984
    t/breaking 💥, area-xaml, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • Fix OnBackButtonPressed on iOS (#8296) #14137
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion/review

    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

    area-architecture
  • [UI Test] Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #21897
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, area-keyboard
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail. #27453
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 2 #27500
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fading option is not activated on already opened files #77319

PullRequests

Created

  • Explictly jump off the main thread before serializing data to call Razor #77321
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Enable basic end-to-end scenarios of extension method invocation. #77320
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Implement TypeScript ExternalAccess wrappers for AsynchronousOperationListener #77318
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Make diagnostic checksum computation into an extension method. #77277
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Change override completion to select text after updating the buffer. #76983
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • WIP: Implement SyntaxReplacer.VisitList #77314
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix typos #77316
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • PERF: Reduce the number of nodes walked during import completion commit. #77305
    VSCode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77292
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Support IsActiveDocument in RoslynCodeSearchResult #77311
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce allocations during completion in FilterToVisibleAndBrowsableSymbols #77315
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add capability in `PEReader` to reject COFF files. #112830
  • JIT/interpreter/InterpreterTester/InterpreterTester.cmd failing under GC stress #112827

Closed

  • AssemblyLoadContext assemblies are not garbage collected #32646
  • Missing TensorPrimitives.StdDev? #112441

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Add new-style ABI classifiers for return values #112829
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Check ISA directly when printing `JitDisasm` #112828
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Consolidate guid definitions #112826
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix an edge case in the Tarjan GC bridge that leads to losing xref information #112825
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution

Merged

  • JIT: Don't show code bytes for loongarch64 disasm unless it was told to do so #112486
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • SPMI: Include JIT-EE GUID changes in JIT baseline detection #112820
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Use FLS detach callback as a thread termination notification. Another try. #112809
    os-windows, area-VM-coreclr
  • Includes type forwarding for System.Text.Unicode.Utf8 to the Microsoft.Bcl.Memory library #111292
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [cDAC] DAC like entry point #112653
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Use SSA-based ComputeRange in assertprop #112824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove uses of old ABI information #112818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [workloads] Bump net10 downlevel versions to n-1 #112805
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Unblock Vector###<long> intrinsics on x86 #112728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • add follow-up assert during unwinding #112817
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Emit revb instructions for BSWAP #112479
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Document important nuances about Dictionary/HashSet #112760
    area-System.Collections
  • FileSystem: guard against stack overflow in recursive delete (#84344) #112644
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add DefaultInterpolatedStringHandler.Text/Clear #112171
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Optimize shift operations for BigInteger #112632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Improve support for 512-bit Vector<T> #111472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add benchmarks.run_pgo_optrepeat collection #112750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
